notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: V.A.B. conceived the study. F.A.O.J. and C.R.R. performed the experiments. Y.d.O. reviewed the nutritional records. M.A.V.B. performed cardiologic consultations. A.S.S. contributed to the physical training program. M.S.B.S. enabled the analysis of blood pressure variability. V.J.B.M. contributed in the statistical analysis. C.M.B. and F.A.O.J. drafted the manuscript. All authors analyzed the data and revised the manuscript critically. All authors have read and agreed to the published version of the manuscript.
